data.description_html:
You create a dagger-shaped piece of ice that launches itself at a target within range as a grenadelike weapon.
The ice dagger deals 1d4 points of cold damage to the target per caster level (maximum 5d4), and the target may make a Reflex save for half damage.
Creatures within 5 feet of the target take 1 point of cold damage.
Material Component: A few drops of water made from melted ice.
data.name: Ice Dagger
